CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, page 9, reads: "Homemakers See Latest in Foods, Appliances...12. M. Lifsher & Son and Mark Lumber & Supply Company combined forces to display their wares at the Home Fair. Lenny Gordon kept up a constant chatter which kept the Home Fair crowd very interested. Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Two men, including Lenny Gordon handing out brochures in M. Lifsher & Son and Mark Lumber & Supply Co. booth with pegboard walls, in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
